page.title: 12A LIFE IN THE DAY OF ANNA
page.content: SOMETIMES WE HAVE MATCHES AGAINST A VISITING SCHOOL TEAM.OCCASIONALLY WE PLAY AWAY. AT 4:00 ON SATURDAYS AND 5:00 ON WEEK DAYS WE PUT ON OUR BLAZERS,ASK PERMISSION TO LEAVE,AND I RUSH OUT TO FIND MY MOTHER WAITING FOR ME.OFF HOME! THE FIRST THING I DO IS CHANGE INTO MY PLAY CLOTHES.THEN I'M OFF TO PLAY WITH MY FRIEND WHO LIVES NEXT DOOR. I'M ALLOWED TO PLAY UNTIL 8:30,WHICH IS WHEN I HAVE MY TEA AND GO TO BED.I PUT ON MY PAJAMAS SLOWLY,CLIMB INTO BED AND SET MY ALARM.I'M SOON ASLEEP:ITS BEEN A LONG DAY.
